candidates.description: A Turborepo monorepo integrating a Medusa2 backend with a Remix frontend, featuring a Coffee Roast themed dynamic storefront. Includes Stripe payment integration, scalability with unlimited products and categories, and a developer-friendly setup using TypeScript and Biome. Ideal for rapidly building scalable e-commerce stores.
candidates.rationale: usefulness=10/30 baseline; integration=22/25 (TypeScript); maintenance=20/20 (stars=145, updated=2025-12-20T02:08:26Z); license=15/15 (MIT); time_to_value=7/10
